body.p: To His Excellency Hon Beriah Mcaggoffin Govenor of Kentucky

Your petitioners would respectfully state to your excellency that at the last March Term of the Madison Circuit Court Thomas Rhodus was fined $10,50cts for an affray and Breach of the Peace. Since that time the said Rhodus has died and Coleman Covington & Jesse Edwards his replevied the judgement aforesaid

We would respectfully say to Your Excellency that said Covington and Edwards, are quiet and orderly citizens of this county, And it would be a great hardship upon them to pay the same, And respectfully suggest ^& ask^ that you remit the same

Thos s Bronstamp.
L E Francis
C A Hawkins
Ed. W. Turner
Geo Dejarnatt
Wm L Biggerstaff
Jas B. McCreary
A J Dudley
R. R. Harris
G J Roberts
John Bermett
J. H. Freeman
A. D. Kavanaugh
R Runyon

Madison Cir. Ct
Remitted
B. M.
Tho. Rhodus
$1050 } affray
Iss d Sept 23rd 1861
